## Call: POST [/{apipath}/{crop}/brapi/v1/token]
```{r}
library(brapi)
library(magrittr)

# make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process
con <- ba_connect()

ba_show_info(TRUE)

msg <- capture.output({
  con <- ba_login(con)
}, type = "message")
ba_show_info(FALSE)
```
